Title: The Underworld
Hints: be imaginative and make it up. Remember this is a sci-fi scene, it should not contain any classical fantasy elements. Try really random ideas out.
Author: Wizards Code
Prompt:
A sci-fi scene depicting "The Underworld" with a dark and menacing atmosphere. The setting is a vast, underground facility or city with towering, eerie structures and immense machinery. The lighting levels are low, casting deep, ominous shadows that obscure various areas, creating a sense of fear and danger. In stark contrast to the darkness, all machinery and textiles are illuminated with bright and striking colors of red, orange, and yellow, providing bold visual highlights. The art style is a simple flat-shaded 3D digital style with bold lines and minimal detail, emphasizing stark contrasts and making the bright colors stand out vividly against the dark background. The overall composition conveys a sense of an otherworldly, mechanical labyrinth filled with unknown terrors lurking in the shadows.

   

Tags: 1girl, 3d, activity underground, background design, best quality, bipedal, bodystocking, building, concept art, environment, full body, grey skin, helmet, light source, machinery, mecha, minimalistic, no humans, scifi, solo, underground, urban dystopia.
